code: import React from'react';import{PAGES}from'../constants';import{setCurrentPage}from'../game/gameSlice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{resetState}from'./uiSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const defaultText="Reset (Lose Progress)";export const RenderFooterButton=_ref=>{let{currentPage}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleReset=()=>{dispatch(resetState());dispatch(setCurrentPage(PAGES.SPLASH));};switch(currentPage){case PAGES.SPLASH:return null;case PAGES.INPUT:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:defaultText});case PAGES.MATCHUP:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:defaultText});case PAGES.RESULTS:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:"Rank Again!"});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:"The Ranking Game"});}};
